forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
